Key: All right. Let's go, darling.
No, Shido will be coming with us.

Agreed. Shido will be attended to by Kaguya
and Yuzuru.

What are you talking about? Shido will obviously
choose me.
No. Shido is going to spend time with me.
Ngh... Isn't there a way out of this...?!
Oh! Look!
Sensei! Help me!

Oh, Itsuka-kun. What's the matter? You seem
distraught.

Tama-ch... I mean... Okamine-sensei!
Please help me.
What? What's going on?
I don't have time to explain. Take me somewhere!
I-Itsuka-kun?!
H-Huh?
Are we eloping?! Me too?!
Crap! She's getting the wrong idea!

I-I don't know what to do. This came out of
nowhere... B-But...
N-No... It's not like that.

O-Okay, Itsuka-kun. Let's fly! Until you reach
the age of marriage... I will take care of you!
No! The situation is really escalating now!
Now, Itsuka-kun, let's grab a taxi! This way!
Ah! Sensei! Okamine-sensei!

(And as I escaped from the girls, I spent the
taxi ride to the airport clearing up the
misunderstanding...)
